trans-unit.target:
TEXT_BANMAM126_05286_SEQ_00<tab>Kageel Ja is in need of seasonings.
※Please note that the difficulty of this quest has been synced to your current level. Furthermore, you may not proceed with a class or job that is different from when you accepted this quest.
TEXT_BANMAM126_05286_SEQ_01<tab>Deliver the requested materials to Kageel Ja.

TEXT_BANMAM126_05286_TODO_00<tab><var 08 E4E80511 ((<var 08 E3E802E803 ((Mine <var 31 ((Item)) 04E8060302 /var> near Iq Br'aax)) ((Deliver <var 31 ((Item)) 03E8060302 /var> to Kageel Ja)) /var>)) ((<var 08 E4E80512 ((<var 08 E3E802E803 ((Gather <var 31 ((Item)) 04E8060302 /var> near Iq Br'aax)) ((Deliver <var 31 ((Item)) 03E8060302 /var> to Kageel Ja)) /var>)) ((<var 08 E4E80513 ((<var 08 E3E802E803 ((Catch <var 31 ((Item)) 02E8060202 /var> at Xd'aa Talat Tsoly)) ((Deliver <var 31 ((Item)) 03E8060202 /var> to Kageel Ja)) /var>)) (()) /var>)) /var>)) /var>.

TEXT_BANMAM126_05286_KAGEELJA_000_001<tab>Mamook's traditional dishes tend to be sparse when it comes to seasonings. Aside from the salt taken from Bitterbark Cenote, the sweet flavoring provided by najool, and a fermented fish sauce, there isn't much else we add to our food.
TEXT_BANMAM126_05286_KAGEELJA_000_002<tab>So for those who have gone on to experience Tuliyollal's varied cuisine, our local fare is decidedly lacking in comparison.

TEXT_BANMAM126_05286_KAGEELJA_000_003<tab>On a related note, I've heard a Xbr'aal visitor mentioning certain ingredients found in the upper forest that might improve the taste of our vegetable soup...
TEXT_BANMAM126_05286_KAGEELJA_000_004<tab>The seasoning you acquired for us the last time has been praised by both the local Mamool Ja and our visiting Xbr'aal friends.
TEXT_BANMAM126_05286_KAGEELJA_000_005<tab>It's been so popular, in fact, that our stores are running dangerously low...

TEXT_BANMAM126_05286_KAGEELJA_000_006<tab>Would you be so kind as to bring back some of the rock salt found near Iq Br'aax? It's said to have a smoother flavor than the stuff we extract from Bitterbark.
TEXT_BANMAM126_05286_KAGEELJA_000_007<tab>Would you be so kind as to harvest some of the white pepper found near Iq Br'aax? It's said to have a spicy kick that enhances the flavor of the vegetables.
TEXT_BANMAM126_05286_KAGEELJA_000_008<tab>Would you be so kind as to pull up some algae from Xd'aa Talat Tsoly? It should go well with the soup once dried and ground into a powder.
TEXT_BANMAM126_05286_KAGEELJA_000_009<tab>Bait your hook with a golden stonefly nymph─an interested fish will drag the algae along for you to pluck free from the water.
TEXT_BANMAM126_05286_KAGEELJA_000_010<tab>The rock salt in question should be found in the vicinity of Iq Br'aax.
TEXT_BANMAM126_05286_KAGEELJA_000_011<tab>The white pepper in question should be found in the vicinity of Iq Br'aax.
TEXT_BANMAM126_05286_KAGEELJA_000_012<tab>You should be able to pull up the algae I spoke of from Xd'aa Talat Tsoly.
TEXT_BANMAM126_05286_KAGEELJA_000_013<tab>Attract the fish with golden stonefly nymphs and they'll bring the algae to you.
TEXT_BANMAM126_05286_KAGEELJA_000_014<tab>How went your hunt for seasonings?
TEXT_BANMAM126_05286_KAGEELJA_000_015<tab>Yes, this will do nicely. My thanks for braving the beasts of the Ut'ohmu Horizon.
TEXT_BANMAM126_05286_KAGEELJA_000_016<tab>Right, I say we get this ingredient prepared and popped into a soup straightaway. Hopefully our Mamook customers find the taste to their liking.
TEXT_BANMAM126_05286_KAGEELJA_000_017<tab>Glad I am that our choice of ingredient found favor with the customers. Our cooks, too, seem thrilled to have a new flavor to experiment with.
TEXT_BANMAM126_05286_KAGEELJA_000_018<tab>As it so happens, this flavor also complements tiika selvaas. Serving it with a side of tasty soup has only made our new dish all the more popular.
TEXT_BANMAM126_05286_KAGEELJA_000_019<tab>You know, if this can persuade even the studious Anggir to finish a meal over returning to her research, then I think we're onto a winner.
